explains: v. 发软；屈服，让步；（人）精神崩溃；（使）弯曲，（使）变形；扣住，扣紧
wordGroup: belt buckle 皮带搭扣；束衣扣
buckle down 倾全力；开始认真从事
buckle up 系好安全带；把…扣紧

sentences.en: These shoes buckle at the side.
He wore a belt with a large brass buckle.
sentences.cn: 他系着一条缀有一颗大铜扣的皮带。

sentences.en: I'd better buckle down to those reports.
sentences.cn: 我最好认真静下来努力完成那些报告。
